distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for 389-ds fixes the following issues:

- 389-ds was updated to version 1.4.3.19 
   - CVE-2020-35518: Fixed an information disclosure during the binding of a DN (bsc#1181159).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: When binding against a DN during authentication, the reply from 389-ds-base will be different whether the DN exists or not. This can be used by an unauthenticated attacker to check the existence of an entry in the LDAP database.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
